des: "This is a light soup of 10,000 stars (pastini). This pasta is hard to find, but worth the search. Serve with grated Parmesan cheese on top and some crusty bread, if desired."
ins: In a large pot, combine pasta, stock, mushroom, tomato paste, wine and salt and pepper to taste.  Cook over medium-high heat for 8 to 10 minutes, or until pasta is al dente.
